html:
5.19.24  1:14 pm   how are you doing

      ok

5.19.24  11:13 am   would you like to have some of the salad i made

      no

5.19.24  10:21 am   you said that orange the fruit came first, but technically the tree came first

      i said the orange fruit came first amongst a set of two choices: the 'orange' colorname or the 'orange' fruitname. technically the tree was not included in those two choices. but as long as we are looking ouside those two choices, technically rocks were even earlier

5.19.24  10:14 am   do u believe in me or bigfoot?

      one of the two

5.19.24  8:17 am   what would be a cool pseudonym?

      galleries

5.19.24  7:51 am   my favorite word is 'gallery'. what's yours?

      galleries

5.19.24  7:10 am   When you lean against a wall do you think that could be considered as some type of a chair for when you are standing up?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

5.19.24  2:38 am   is every somewhere a nowhere?

      no

5.19.24  1:52 am   should i kick things into high gear

      have you thought about changing gears with your hands

5.19.24  1:17 am   what is your opinion on the ancient language of latin?

      it's good

5.19.24  12:34 am   i used to pronounce etc. "excetera". but now i cringe at that pronunciation. i think i've truly grown and changed as a person

      ah, but do you still say "excape"

5.18.24  11:43 pm   Should I consider the consequences of my actions

      sometimes

5.18.24  11:09 pm   would you ever go skydiving

      no

5.18.24  10:58 pm   Best metaphor you have heard?

      things are very big

5.18.24  10:21 pm   Why do they make everyone put their tables and seats up when they're landing the plane? Is it to stop the plane from crashing or purely performative

      they need to be reset sometime before the next flight. and it's definitely easier to have the passengers each do their own, rather than the crew having to do them all. Now the question is when to ask them to do it. for some reason i think the passengers will be more obedient before the plane lands than after

5.18.24  10:07 pm   how do i become a billionaire in 12 minutes

      click here. or just click here anyway fuck it

5.18.24  9:55 pm   who do you think sings the ahh part of a day in the life by the Beatles? People argue about that

      i've never made it that far

5.18.24  9:43 pm   I live in Alabama; do you have any ideas on what I could do about this

      how about this: you can go to Mississippi

5.18.24  9:14 pm   Opinions on people telling you about opinions on opinons?

      that's actually never happened before. but it's certainly been talked about

5.18.24  8:57 pm   Does this q&a cause any stress? Like does it feel like a burden at times? Asking as a person who avoids opening emails that require response. Love your work

      it's the best kind of stress

5.18.24  7:05 pm   wouldn't it be cool do create a collection of musics where all the songs are super super super different from each other, or do you think that would be a bit jarring

      it would be cool, and jarring. that's ok, most people like to be jarred

5.18.24  7:03 pm   ive decided that i will upload my thing by the end of the month. even if its unfinished.

      that should be interesting

5.18.24  6:41 pm   If you were a dinosaur, what dinosaur would you be?

      maybe one of the huge ones

5.18.24  6:20 pm   how long do you usually sleep for each night

      between 6 and 12 hours

5.18.24  6:12 pm   how to ruin my whole neighborhood, or town?

      start saying "all the sudden"

5.18.24  6:00 pm   Can I ask you a rhetorical question?

      you can try

5.18.24  5:57 pm   is cheese a soild or liquid? or maybe its some it's some type of sauce? smoothie? or perhaps its something we simply cannot comprehend, therefore our brains tricks you into thinking you are eating cheese but really its something else???? What if cheese isn't real?

      cheese, of course, is aliens

5.18.24  2:34 pm   Why are your answers less surreal lately

      it just depends which ones you've chosen to read. the plain white text creates a hypnotic environment where it's quite easy to have selective vision. if you read one that made you feel a certain way, it's quite easy to read many of the others in a similar light, or even totally ignore the ones that don't fit with that mood

5.18.24  2:33 pm   often when i start to make a song, it gets stuck in "buildup mode," where I keep adding more instruments over time, trying to get it to sound like the song's started and it's not still the intro, but it still feels like it's trying to build up to something. is there a way to avoid this?

      i have no idea. i have my own problems with song arrangements that i still haven't solved either

5.18.24  1:59 pm   What does your spotify description mean

      music

5.18.24  1:37 pm   thoughts on chuck berry starting all of his songs with the same riff

      iconic

5.18.24  12:53 pm   how come movies based off books end up cutting stuff out?

      simply because movies are shorter

5.18.24  11:12 am   what kind of scenario would result in a plate of ribs by mistake

      i have to assume there was a bit involving ribs that got cut at the last minute. and the ribs remained

5.18.24  10:35 am   Why are you so important to me?

      maybe you admire my expert use of the semi-colon ;

5.18.24  10:07 am   what should i do today?

      you could start a small business. or start a big business, what the heck

5.18.24  8:41 am   I want to learn how to draw/animate, but I can't find the motivation. It feels like it'll take too long or it just isn't worth all that effort. How can I get started?

     i'm confused. maybe i don't understand english as well as i thought. you said you want to. then you said you're not motivated to. that sounds like a contradiction. of all the different motivations you can have, 'wanting' i thought would be the most basic strongest motivator of all possible motivators. do you want to? or you don't want to? maybe i don't actually understand what the word 'motivation' means

5.18.24  8:31 am   is this bill wurtz

      how did you know

5.18.24  7:39 am   i just want you to know that anytime i (attempt to) browse a website with a cookie consent popup, an invitation to subscribe to a newsletter, a video that auto-plays, an article split in 5 pages that could've been in just one but they really want you to click that next button to keep reading for some reason, or any combination of these, thinking about this website has a very very calming effect

      isn't it a miracle that it's still legal to actually just present the content outright

5.18.24  4:57 am   Do you like green tractors?

      i don't mind them

5.18.24  4:19 am   Is there anything you're planning to plan?

      sure, i'm planning to plan on planning

5.18.24  4:11 am   I'm really really struggling to learn piano. I don't have a teacher since I can't afford one so I watch videos, but all the memorization of chords and scales and stuff is difficult for me (I'd like to play jazz eventually). Have you any tips or potential tricks to get the hang of it easier? 

      memorizing is really not gonna get you anywhere. just have fun, and be curious. and stay close to the songs and music you really love

5.18.24  2:04 am   I wish there was a word for words that are only used in conjunction with specific other words, like how nobody says "wreak" unless it's followed by "havoc"

      how about a cog

5.18.24  1:09 am   what is your definition of "real"?

      actual

5.18.24  1:01 am   do you disagree with the general idea of rating stuff? as in an out of 10 scale or a 5 star system

      could be useful, but it's just an estimation

5.17.24  11:21 pm   i want to make music and i want to make a video game. i also want to make music for the video game. should i make some standalone music first or should i cross my fingers and make the game/music combo immediately

      it really doesn't matter which one you do first. whichever one you do first will inspire the other

5.17.24  10:45 pm   do you still whatever

      that's all the heck i do

5.17.24  10:40 pm   why do they call it 'world music', it feels like a silly term

      because they are silly

5.17.24  8:58 pm   when is language 2.0 going to drop

      "in the new year"

5.17.24  8:29 pm   what do you plan to do when you're 500 years old?

      maybe i will do a Q&A

5.17.24  7:40 pm   How did you learn piano 

      by playing it a lot. its functionality is completely intuitive, so then all you need is experience
